contradicting_spans: M. de Villefort had scarcely said this, when the door opened, and Barrois appeared.
reasoning: Contradiction (temporal): This excerpt contradicts the claim that Noirtier married Éloïse in order to obtain royalist intelligence from the Vendée.

analysis.claim_text: To obtain royalist intelligence from the Vendée he married Éloïse, daughter of a ruined local noble (1800); when he learned she secretly backed the Chouans he arranged her “accidental” drowning (1802).
